specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. These statistics include an adjustment to account for item nonresponse beginning in survey year 2016. This change has affected the comparability of these company count estimates with estimates published for years prior to 2016. These statistics do not include an adjustment to account for unit nonresponse.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey.
